title: Stormbreaker01
author: Stormbreaker01
content: BTC prediction in years 2023, 2024 and 2025According to my opinion In 2023, the price of the BTC reached $40k expected at the end of the year and the average movement price is between $25k to $28k. Bitcoin price prediction will continue to rise during 2024 the price of BTC between $50k to $60k and the average moving line of BTC is $55k 2025 also expected that the Bitcoin price prediction that will continue to rise in the year 2025 where I expect that BTC will brake the ATH and build a new ATH on $100k.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: In my view, the price will rise steadily(ups and downs, but generally up) till the halving next year. After the halving the price will keep rising averagely but will not start making price jumps until a few months after the halving where we will now enter the bull run.2023 price peak prediction: $35k - $40k2024 price peak prediction: $60k - $65k2025 price peak prediction: $90k - $130k.- Jay -

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: I expect bitcoin to have reached all-time-high by 2024. I mean I expect bitcoin to increase above $69000 by 2024. But I am still expecting $130000 to $170000 by 2025. The all-time-high after 2024 halving would likely be in 2025 and bitcoin would have increased above $100000 by that time.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Maybe at least tell us why you think bitcoin will move precisely that way? So we actually have something to talk about rather than just us randomly throwing darts at a dartboard. Halving? Spot ETF? Anything?

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Everything can happen. But we must remember that it is only a prediction that may not come true. Moreover, the condition of the Bitcoin price is still unstable and cannot increase higher. When the Bitcoin price reached $ 31k, it didn't take long for the price to decline again and it almost touched the $ 28k level (or maybe it has touched it). But then the Bitcoin price returned to the $29k level it had hitherto been.I don't really think about the price of Bitcoin at the end of this year or at the beginning of the year because my focus is still on accumulating more Bitcoin. And people shouldn't think too much about how much Bitcoin is worth and focus on how much Bitcoin they can collect at these times.But for the long term, in 2024 or 2025, I predict Bitcoin price will reach more than $100k. Maybe it can happen after the next halving. But I don't know how much the price of Bitcoin will be until the end of this year because it's better to enjoy the journey of Bitcoin.

comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 27, 2023, 06:58:26 AMMaybe at least tell us why you think bitcoin will move precisely that way? The halving will make miners hold until they are profitable and with growing hashrate and declining rewards, either the entire mining industry goes bankrupt and investors lose billions, or the price goes up and everyone makes money. It’s a feedback loop.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Entering 2025 seems to be a pleasant year where Bitcoin can reach a price of $100k and above according to the predictions of each person here. and for the year-end price, this time it might be able to touch the price of $40k and that's the most suitable price. Waiting for the Halving in 2024 is the closest, only a few months away.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: I am not even going to talk about bitcoin's price for 2023. My outlook is already on 2024 because we are expecting the halving and the halving with take the price up. Based on analysis and the observed historical patterns, Bitcoin price predictions for  2024 could be around $60,000, $80,000, and $100,000. In 2025 my Bitcoin price prediction could be around $238,000, $117,000, $333,000, and $571,000.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: With how fast the movement of different investment firms like Fidelity and Blackrock with their exchange-traded funds then I bet the price fluctuation will soon make a reaction on the market. This year, I will be happy when Bitcoin reaches $35k by the end of 2023. For the next year is where retail investors will start to make the demand higher when they see this sudden movement of Bitcoin so $40k - $45k and then the halving will come which hypes up the market and FOMOs will definitely come, $50k - $55k at that moment but it might still go down due to correction before the end of the year so $50k will be the minimum, I think. 2025 is when another reaction will come due to the hype, $60k or above ATH is where I see Bitcoin will be. $100k for me is a long shot, we saw $69k because of the shock, I don't think that can happen again that fast without a billionaire on our side.

All in all, along the way I expect major resistance. At $50K, to approach the previous ATH of $69K, and above all at $100K a huge resistance that will be hard to beat several times.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: I see Bitcoin above 100K in the future but there's no exact timeline since it's very hard to determine what's gonna happened in Bitcoin every year because news occur unpredictable. Predicting prices on specific year doesn't give much credibility on predictions in comparison when you made a prediction opin the future without any definite timeline. I think the future valuation that you expect to happened without specific timeline is more appropriate to predict instead of assigning price each year.
